data.message:
On my 10th listen... this is a masterpiece.

The thing is when I first heard it I was like here comes the beat here it is here it is here we go Dre beats...he's gonna spaz...he's gonna spaz but it doesn't happen. But the next listens you accept it as it is and it's so depressing and emotionally deep... flow impeccable... I am crying every time I play it around the last verse... Em... this is his shot of making another classic.
